summary: When Snoopy receives a letter from a girl named Lila, who's in a hospital, he goes on a journey with Woodstock to see her.
cast: Chad Webber|Robin Kohn|Stephen Shea|David Carey|Johanna Baer|Hilary Momberger-Powers|Christopher DeFaria|Linda Ercoli|Lynda Mendelson|Bill Melendez
title: Snoopy, vuelve a casa
